E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 7/9/1977
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Ken Sanders



Date: Friday, 7/11/1977
Subject: Progress of Glenn Burke
Dear Sir,
Glenn Burke has nothing more to prove at AA Jersey City Indians!
He has an AVG of .283 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
